---
title: "Update to recruitment due to expanded migration code"
date: "2021-01-26"
author: "Fulton, Beth (Environment, Hobart)"
---

We have had to add an additional parameter
**XXX_cohort_recruit_entry**
that identifies which cohort recruits enter in. Typically, this is zero, but for multi-year and complicated migration patterns this may be set to a value of one or more.
